title: Lightning Bolt
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                        |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Fires a mighty bolt of lightning. Its damage bypasses half of defender's armour, and it can be bounced off walls to hit targets twice. |

**Lightning Bolt** is a monster-only spell which fires a somewhat inaccurate bolt of lightning, similar to [Shock](/Shock "Shock"). This bolt can pierce through enemies. If the lightning bolt hits a rock or stone [wall](/Wall "Wall"), it will bounce back at an angle, potentially striking a target twice. See [doublezap](/Doublezap "Doublezap") for more information.

As a property of BEAM\_ELEC damage, it ignores 1/2 of enemy [AC](/AC "AC"). It also creates a lot of [noise](/Noise "Noise") and will set [trees](/Tree "Tree") on fire.

The following enemies cast Lightning Bolt:

- C [![Antaeus.png](/images/0/01/Antaeus.png)](/File:Antaeus.png) **[Antaeus](/Antaeus "Antaeus")** (3d25 damage)
- d [![Black draconian.png](/images/e/ed/Black_draconian.png)](/File:Black_draconian.png) **[Black draconian](/Black_draconian "Black draconian")** (3d19 damage)
- 2 [![Blizzard demon.png](/images/2/25/Blizzard_demon.png)](/File:Blizzard_demon.png) **[Blizzard demon](/Blizzard_demon "Blizzard demon")** (3d18 damage)
- e [![Deep elf annihilator.png](/images/5/5f/Deep_elf_annihilator.png)](/File:Deep_elf_annihilator.png) **[Deep elf annihilator](/Deep_elf_annihilator "Deep elf annihilator")** (3d20 damage)
- e [![Deep elf zephyrmancer.png](/images/7/70/Deep_elf_zephyrmancer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_zephyrmancer.png) **[Deep elf zephyrmancer](/Deep_elf_zephyrmancer "Deep elf zephyrmancer")** (3d16 damage)
- q [![Draconian annihilator.png](/images/6/65/Draconian_annihilator.png)](/File:Draconian_annihilator.png) **[Draconian annihilator](/Draconian_annihilator "Draconian annihilator")** (3d21 damage)
- 9 [![Electric golem.png](/images/f/f9/Electric_golem.png)](/File:Electric_golem.png) **[Electric golem](/Electric_golem "Electric golem")** (3d20 damage)
- @ [![Louise.png](/images/1/1f/Louise.png)](/File:Louise.png) **[Louise](/Louise "Louise")** (3d19 damage)
- @ [![Nikola.png](/images/3/3a/Nikola.png)](/File:Nikola.png) **[Nikola](/Nikola "Nikola")** (3d22 damage)
- a [![Servant of whispers.png](/images/0/0f/Servant_of_whispers.png)](/File:Servant_of_whispers.png) **[Servant of whispers](/Servant_of_whispers "Servant of whispers")** (3d18 damage)
- Q [![Sojobo.png](/images/6/66/Sojobo.png)](/File:Sojobo.png) **[Sojobo](/Sojobo "Sojobo")** (3d24 damage)
- i [![Spriggan air mage.png](/images/c/cd/Spriggan_air_mage.png)](/File:Spriggan_air_mage.png) **[Spriggan air mage](/Spriggan_air_mage "Spriggan air mage")** (3d19 damage)
- D [![Storm dragon.png](/images/5/5b/Storm_dragon.png)](/File:Storm_dragon.png) **[Storm dragon](/Storm_dragon "Storm dragon")** (3d19 damage)
- Q [![Tengu conjurer.png](/images/a/ac/Tengu_conjurer.png)](/File:Tengu_conjurer.png) **[Tengu conjurer](/Tengu_conjurer "Tengu conjurer")** (3d14 damage)
- Q [![Tengu reaver.png](/images/2/24/Tengu_reaver.png)](/File:Tengu_reaver.png) **[Tengu reaver](/Tengu_reaver "Tengu reaver")** (3d22 damage)
- C [![Titan.png](/images/8/88/Titan.png)](/File:Titan.png) **[Titan](/Titan "Titan")** (3d24 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Lightning Bolt, depending on their spell set:

- & [![Pandemonium lord.png](/images/c/c6/Pandemonium_lord.png)](/File:Pandemonium_lord.png) **[Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord")** (5.2% chance)
- d [![Tiamat.png](/images/9/9a/Tiamat.png)](/File:Tiamat.png) **[Tiamat](/Tiamat "Tiamat")** (3d25 damage, 16.7% chance)

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), Lightning Bolt was a level 5 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic") spell that players could cast.

Lightning Bolt is a monster-only spell which fires a somewhat inaccurate bolt of lightning, similar to Shock. This bolt can pierce through enemies. If the lightning bolt hits a rock or stone wall, it will bounce back at an angle, potentially striking a target twice. See doublezap for more information.

As a property of BEAM_ELEC damage, it ignores 1/2 of enemy AC. It also creates a lot of noise and will set trees on fire.

The following enemies cast Lightning Bolt:

  • d Black draconian (3d19 damage)
